name: Kaasje 3D
description:
Kaasje 3D is a game I created as a school project.
This is also the first game I ever created.
The game is based on a popular dutch game called: Kaasje.
The original kaasje is a 2D endless platformer where your goal is to get as many cheese as you can.
This game is basicly the same thing but 3D!
This game is in early stages of development and I hope I'm going to have time to keep working on this game.
